characters.name: Anakin Skywalker
characters.description: Anakin Skywalker had the potential to become one of the most powerful Jedi ever.

characters.name: Obi-Wan Kenobi
characters.description: A legendary Jedi Master, Obi-Wan was noble and skilled in the ways of the Force.

characters.name: Luke Skywalker
characters.description: Luke rose from humble beginnings to become one of the greatest Jedi.

characters.name: Master Yoda
characters.description: Yoda was a wise and powerful Jedi Master who trained Jedi for over 800 years.

characters.name: Han Solo
characters.description: Han was a smuggler-turned-hero who fought for the Rebel Alliance.

characters.name: Leia Organa
characters.description: Leia was a leader of the Rebel Alliance and a symbol of hope for the galaxy.

characters.name: Kylo Ren
characters.description: The son of Han Solo and Leia Organa, Ben Solo was seduced by the dark side of the Force.

characters.name: Darth Vader
characters.description: Once a Jedi, Darth Vader became one of the most feared Sith Lords in history.

characters.name: Darth Maul
characters.description: Maul is a powerful Sith Lord, known for his fearsome appearance and skills in battle.

characters.name: Chewbacca
characters.description: Chewbacca, a famed Wookiee warrior and Han Solo's long-time co-pilot, continues to serve as trusty first mate as he pilots the Millennium Falcon on dangerous missions against the First Order.

characters.name: Boba Fett
characters.description: With his customized Mandalorian armor, deadly weaponry, Boba Fett was once regarded as one of the most fearsome and capable bounty hunters in the galaxy.

characters.name: R2-D2
characters.description: R2-D2, the second droid in the Star Wars saga, was the first robotic droid ever created by the Galactic Empire.

characters.name: The Stormtroopers
characters.description: Stormtroopers are elite shock troops that are fiercely devoted to the Empire and cannot be swayed from their goal.

characters.name: C-3PO
characters.description: C-3PO longs for more peaceful times, but his continued service to the Resistance keeps the worry-prone droid in the frontlines of galactic conflict.

characters.name: Rey
characters.description: Seemingly abandoned by her parents on Jakku, Rey grew up a scavenger amid the wreckage of war.
